title: Close Out an Ethics Review
description: After a conflicts check revealed a potential issue, the firm's ethics committee reviewed it and cleared the firm to take the case. An administrator needs to document this.

tasks.description: Locate the open conflicts check record for the matter.
Draft a memo to the file summarizing the ethics committee's review and its conclusion that no disqualifying conflict exists.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a formal record of the decision.

tasks.description: Attach the memo to the conflicts check record and change its status to 'Cleared'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The conflict has been formally resolved and documented in the system.
